website_summaries.verdict: This flexible soft rack is easy to use for up to 2 longboards or 6 shortboards.
pros: Easy to both mount and remove
Can hold up to 2 longboards or 6 shortboards
cons: Some buyers say that boards become loose too easily when traveling
Straps can channel water into your car

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack.
customer_reviews.text: Got the first use out of the rack. On way to beach we hadn't tightened it quite as much and definitely heard some buffeting above 65mph. But on the way back we put the by-gods to it, and didn't hear a sound the entire 3 hour trip. worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Catsanova Von Diddlesworth

customer_reviews.title: Firm racks work alot better,but if you are flying and renting a car this is the tool
customer_reviews.text: Here is the deal with soft racks, they do not hold your boards like firm racks they always wiggle all over, they scratch up the car, and they cause rain to leak in the windows. They do however fit in your suit case when you travel and if you need to put a few boards on a rental car on your next trip this is the right tool. Make sure the rental guy notes the roof scratches left by the last guy so you don't get charged for them, in Hawaii and Costa Rica and similar places it happens more than you'd think.
customer_reviews.author: mike shutt

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick trips to the beach
customer_reviews.text: I use this for two 8' boards and love it. I leave the boards attached to the rack and just remove it from the car. Quick on, quick off. Much more flexible than a single set of bars for one car. Actual rack is very good quality - straps and clips are heavy duty. Can see them lasting a while. Only drawbacks are those you'll find with all soft racks - the straps go through the car, and you need to be careful of scratching the paint work (with the heavy duty clips) whilst removing the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2 door car nicely
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2001 Honda Civic 2 door and these work great! I’ve had 4 boards up there at once and it worked great never budged. For the price you can’t beat it. On the freeway sometimes it hums but nothing To be worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the surfboards on top of my suv with a sunroof top and no rails. It’s pretty easy to get on and off. A bit noisy but otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: MTFF

customer_reviews.title: I have a 2013 Ford Escape with no roof rack ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Ford Escape with no roof rack. Thanks to this kit I can safely tie down a surf board and drive across San Diego at 75 MPH without a worry. Well I do worry about Niki Manage, but that's another subject.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works for more than just small watercraft.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to haul a pop-up sunshade and a couple rugs on top of my Honda Fit. Super easy to use, good, tight hold. Designed to hold narrow things on left and/or right, you could probably attach a single, wider item across the middle with the addition of separate tie-down straps. An excellent alternative to more expensive, permanent roof racks for relatively light loads.
customer_reviews.author: C McKenna

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR SNOWBOARDS TOO
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for SNOWBOARDS, as I take many road trips up to the mountains and need more space inside my car for luggage. It works PERFECT for snowboards, you can put 1 on each strap (=2 boards) OR you can double up inside a snowboard bag and put 2 boards per strap (=4 boards)... the flexibility is endless! They hold pretty tight, especially on freeways and mountain roads. They also work perfectly for surfboards (as that’s what it’s made for). I would definitely buy this again. It was a wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Diep

customer_reviews.title: A workable system
customer_reviews.text: It works for securing surfboard to top of a car. It is a soft system, involving string straps through the interior of the car. So, it is a little bit of a task to set up and take down when not using. But, for those with a small car, it does the trick for transporting to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: So cool! I've never owned a surf rack so I can't compare, but I really love this rack. I can fit two boards on my teeny tiny car. And then the whole thing folds back into a small bag that sits in my trunk and takes up almost no space. It's pretty dang sturdy, but I have never gone more than 50 mph with boards on the car.
customer_reviews.author: EmilieJolie

customer_reviews.title: Cool item.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. I didnt want to install a roof rack to my prius c. Used this to tie down lumber lol. Who says you cant haul crap on top of your prius c...
customer_reviews.author: Vyvyan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, simple & worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rack for our 9' long board and our 11' stand up paddle board. We took them on vacation 500 miles away last month and the rack worked like a charm. No issues what so ever. They arrived at our house even sooner than we thought (thank you!) and they are exactly as advertised. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Good quality. Good price. However, it's not for a SUP. Should hold long surf board not as thick as a SUP. Still works for me if I put it over my board instead of under. I put my board inside the bag to protect the roof. As I said it's good but not for SUP.
customer_reviews.author: Rosabloom

customer_reviews.title: OK racks, staps too short
customer_reviews.text: These are great short board racks but the packaging greatly over estimates the board capacity. I'd say 4 thin short boards max. You longs boards need to be pretty thin and forget about SUPs all together. If you dont need much capacity, these are solid soft racks.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worthless instructions
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. The instructions on the package are pretty bad though, the pictures are impossible to decipher. Fortunately, the product doesn't really need instructions so it's not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stubelicious

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my surfer boyfriend who needed a pair of soft racks. We tested them with a long board and were very happy with the racks. The straps work fairly good with a lock easy to install. However, when the speed of his car exceeds 50, the straps get loose a little bit. But the board didn't risk falling off anyways. I guess this could be a good thing for surfers to avoid speed ticket? LOL
customer_reviews.author: SidLu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Hold up to two longboards/funboard and six, thats right SIX, shortboards! I went on a trip with my friends 1 funboard and 2 shortboards, we were driving on the freeway at around 70-75mpg, no problems, no noise, etc. Worked perfectly. The only con, if there are non surfers in the car with you they might be annoyed with the straps hanging down, but all you have to do is wrap it up. Takes a away a little head room in the cabin but not even noticeable! If you're looking for a soft rack that holds a lot of boards, easy to install and uninstall, then get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjah

customer_reviews.title: Have done great even at highway speed for extended distances
customer_reviews.text: Have used these to transport both a kayaks and surfboards. Have done great even at highway speed for extended distances. May want to place a piece of cloth between them and your roof as they will scratch the paint on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: John R McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Used it to carry to 8' Costco surfboards on the freeway from Los Feliz to Malibu, on the freeway for an hour each way with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nate W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product I install them on my Peugeot 206 and ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not very clear. Great product I install them on my Peugeot 206 and they fir perfectly. A 1 hour drive at 110 km/h and no noise. The downside is that I live in a very rainy country and when it rains and the straps get really wet, they start dripping
customer_reviews.author: Paco

customer_reviews.title: Good price, okay for surf boards
customer_reviews.text: Good price, okay for surf boards. I live close to the beach so for surface streets I'm comfortable with it. I'm not sure you can tighten it down enough to go on the freeway. I wouldn't try it but then again it might be fine.
customer_reviews.author: SCC

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: It came in great condition and fast service. I am going to try these racks out during the weekend and see just how well they keep my boards in place. I'm always interested to see how week things work once I purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: and it worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works very well at keeping the boards in place. I have put two longboards and a shortboard on at the same time, and it worked like a charm. This is definitely something I would recommend if you're looking for both speed (assembling/removing) and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Drachenberg

customer_reviews.title: works decent
customer_reviews.text: fits my two door car well. but it still moves a little no matter how much u tighten it. my board never fell off even though my streets have a lot of bumbs.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product
customer_reviews.text: These made my windows leak & did not effectively hold down my surfboards. I had to reach & grab the board to keep it from getting too much air. On longer drives I had to pull over & readjust the boards & tighten the rack. Find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Easy to strap on and easy to take off. The straps are locked in your car when you are away so you do not need to worry about them getting stolen as well. I can easily fit 2 long boards on each side. 4 long boards total. Would recommend to anyone. One thing though, I have not taken it on the highway so I am not sure how that would work out but I think it would go well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well. Holds both one longboard and one shortboard ...
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. Holds both one longboard and one shortboard up to 55 mph. Haven't really gone faster yet but I could hold faster too. Only problem is when it rains it leaks inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. A much cheaper solution to installing metal racks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great just make sure that they are on TIGHT so they don't scratch your paint. Also the wax on the board may melt down to your roof. To avoid either remove the wax of place the board into a board sock.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Block Wrap-Rax
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to use primarily on our golf cart, so our 14 year old son could get from home to beach with boards on top. So far works very well. Have also used with fishing rods. The padding is good, they stay secure and don't seem to move around much. Very good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: G. Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for so many things and so easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: LCuda

customer_reviews.title: It fits my Jeep Wragler and it is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Sooo helpful and functional! It fits my Jeep Wragler and it is very easy to use. It holds my 6'2 surf board and 8'0 board. It had also held camping tent and beach chairs driving 60mph.
customer_reviews.author: frequenttraveler

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We carried two surf boards over 700 miles on highways in the pouring rain with this rack. On top of a Honda Accord. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ruby

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rack. Super easy to install and take off when needed. Had it for over 2 years, has slight wear from use, but it's still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko A.

customer_reviews.title: He hauls two surfboard easily and safely
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new soft racks. He hauls two surfboard easily and safely. Great packaging, price and product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: board rack
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was really hesitant buying a soft rack but this one is great. I have to drive about 200 miles round trip to go surfing and I have had 6 shortboards on top and did 70 mph no problem. Just make sure you boards are in a good bag. The straps can dig into the boards rail. Overall I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Holds my surfboard securely...which is exactly what you want! Great purchase, Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 10Ft board extremely well on top of a Mini Cooper
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The rack works great
customer_reviews.text: Took my SUP from Phoenix to San Diego. The rack held great. I stopped every so often to check and the tie downs never loosened. No dents or scratches on the top of my car. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Slick

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This works just as expected and works perfectly with soft top boards on the freeway no issues and rock solid. would highly recommend and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car pooling to the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Me & my friends car pool to the beach when we surf in the morning. We can easily fit a surf board for each of us on my car & I drive a four door BMW 325i. Love it. 🏄
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, no complications, simple
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, at least with my boards. Quick on and off, secure, a I need.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great not having to put on a permanent rack, great price. If the straps are vibrating, try putting a twist in the strap, that eliminated the annoying buzzing.
customer_reviews.author: San Jose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Ordered Friday received them Saturday went surfing Sunday
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I put these on my Nissan Xterra and have used them several times. Not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Finally a solid surf rack!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Xmas. He loves it, zero complaints, very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin James Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Work as promised. Easy to set up and take off. Held the short boards great, little dicier on the long boards which is what they mention and don't recommend over a certain length in the instructions. Luckily we weren't going too far or fast with the long ones. When we were done just take them off and bag them up.
customer_reviews.author: William Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Had worked well on all cars we've had it on so far!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Waisner

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps up to 4 board 2 long boards and two short boards... so easy a caveman could put the rack together
customer_reviews.author: zachary wrightsman

customer_reviews.title: It's totally Awesome Dudes!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, Easy to put on and take off the roof of your car.. Very firm hold for your surf boards. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: great product, not too expensive and it works to ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, not too expensive and it works to carry around your board. Is not the most fancy rack but it does the job! great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma Rios

customer_reviews.title: Bad Instructions - Product Works Though
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are hard to read. You can figure it out (eventually) but they really ought to spend a bit of time writing up a better one pager.
customer_reviews.author: eGirl

customer_reviews.title: Block Surf Double Wrap Rack
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Carried 4 boards already. I liked the fact that there are no metal pieces attached to my car like the other products. Also, the rectangular versus round padding provides more stability. I would recommend this product to anyone that requires soft racks.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A. Tashiro

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too much to say, is ok. Unfortunately it does not fit well to the car. Is not strong enough. Much better is buy a surf rack.
customer_reviews.author: angel.guiloff

customer_reviews.title: Great roof rack so far taken 4 trips 3 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Great roof rack so far taken 4 trips 3 hours each way held up great no board shift we'll see how they hold up in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great, very sturdy and easy to use but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, very sturdy and easy to use but I purchased to carry my SUP and the straps are a tad short for my board
customer_reviews.author: greg noll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No noise either, and it holds my two 9' boards just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Tooch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rack. Able to carry my surfboard at 70 mph freeway speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality work great
customer_reviews.text: Have the single version and wanted the double. These are a great quality and work great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diver

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for it's price point
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for it's price point. I also live in a rainy climate and have no issues with water leaking in my Subaru Foerster. I'm happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nevills

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment in Your Fun!
customer_reviews.text: SO glad I purchased! Can fit 2 9.5ft long boards on top of my little Kia Rio safely. This thing is great! It does leak a little through the weather stripping if it rains, but nothing crazy.
customer_reviews.author: RyanB

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've had this rack for about two months and the straps are already starting to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Mason

customer_reviews.title: Surf racks for Prius
customer_reviews.text: Block Surf makes a great product. Fits my Prius perfectly. The order came super fast and they even throw in a storage bag! Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Coggins

customer_reviews.title: work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: seem to be well constructed and works well. Used them several times and they hold surfboards even when driving at freeway speeds
customer_reviews.author: T. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my car.
customer_reviews.text: At about 45 mph couldn't keep longboard from lifting in the air. Have used other soft racks in the past and never experience this problem. Could have to do with size of board 9' as I didn't try it with my shortboards.
customer_reviews.author: R in the city

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in rain
customer_reviews.text: It was a very sturdy rack. The problem was driving through several days of rain storms. The rain soaked the straps and leaked in to car.
customer_reviews.author: jcbg

customer_reviews.title: Great surf racks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Racks are great and have a good carrying bag and were way cheap and totally worth it. Super secure and my log doesn't blow in the wind too much. Highly recommend. Thanks Block Surf
customer_reviews.author: zachary herbert ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: The surf board rack is great for 2 surfboards and can fit up to 4, but it's a little tight at that point. I hate having to redo and undo the straps all the time but there's no great way around that. Otherwise, one of my beefs is that the black rack gets covered with surfboard wax easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ori J. Benhamou

customer_reviews.title: Surf racks
customer_reviews.text: Love it. and easy to assemble. The description was very accurate. Very pleased with this and have used it a lot this summer
customer_reviews.author: P. Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely! just don't go over 60mph or your board will bounce
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sung

customer_reviews.title: Great but not when it rains
customer_reviews.text: They go on easy and hold two longboards on securely...BUT don't leave them on when it rains because they leak! This review is based on a '14 Jeep Compass.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Strong and economical. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect on my VW Beetle. It can hold four bodyboards easily and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Sueko

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, hugs the car well, but straps are to short. Wasn’t able to at least fit one. Product does me no good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only problem is I drive a small car ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only problem is I drive a small car (Honda Civic) and when I drive the straps almost hit my head (I'm 6' 2")
customer_reviews.author: cooptown

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever had from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I ever had from Amazon. This is the perfect surf rack to throw on the car and go! Good quality, good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Westman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Works super well on my Prius and couldn't have asked for a more clutch surf rack!
customer_reviews.author: Noah shafi

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas. He thinks it's just great, easy to install on top of car & easy storage in trunk, when not using. Not taking anymore space in garage.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Todd

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this system. I bought this thinking that I would rarely need both racks, but I was wrong. It's worth the extra $10 and I've noticed that this system makes much less noise than a single rack. Seriously just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Husain

customer_reviews.title: Universal and Light
customer_reviews.text: I never have to worry about renting surfboard racks or getting racks that work with my rental vehicle. They are also very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bakke

customer_reviews.title: This particular unit is not for paddle boards.
customer_reviews.text: Well, first, no, it will not support a paddle board. I made the mistake of getting this, thinking it would hold my 11' paddle board. The straps are not long enough. This set is designed for small surf boards, not paddle boards. It is well built and nice concept, just that this unit does not accommodate larger paddle boards. Now, I am out money and shopping to get one that does accommodate paddle boards.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. I had it attached in 10 minutes. Holds boards tight.
customer_reviews.author: john Coheley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to attach and remove. One person no problem. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Beyer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to give any product a 5 star rating as every thing can be improved upon, but for the price this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: can carry many boards, easy to use on any vehicle! be warned that the straps will leak into the car if super wet and rainy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephi

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea if you have a nice Car
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that if I had a turd car I would have kept this Wrap Rack. It works really good and looks nice. The problem I had was it was on my Volvo XC60R with flush rails and it took the paint off one of them. Not Happy. This happened after the first use and scratched my roof. It is not the product but more just the design.. Salt water,sand,25lb paddle board sitting on your roof rubbing back and forth on every bump and turn. It was a no brainer to send it back.I ended up buying a THULE complete rack system w Paddle board carrier ( $700 bucks )but my car will not get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: The Brutally Honest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - maybe 5 min to install and 2 to remove. Great because its so portable!

customer_reviews.title: Great surfboard rack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack for a trip I made to the Hawaiian Islands. It was compact and very easy to install on the roof of our auto. The key to success on using this rack for surfboards is to place the board face down with the fins close to the straps. No problem even on windy Maui days. Wish I bought it sooner for CA. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: no racks, no problem
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Perfect for a care without racks or rails
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: great surfboard rack
customer_reviews.text: my sister is crazy with surfing and this is a great fit for her a her friends boards taking the freeway to go surfing on her little kia.
customer_reviews.author: Lola-li

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This soft surf rack works perfect. I ordered this rack for my mercedes becasue its extremly difficult to put the seats down in my car. However this rack fits perfect. I didnt order this rack for surf boards tho i ordered it for the soul purpose of strapping on snowboards to my roof I love this and will be taking it up the mountain alot in the future. Used it twice now and have had no problems with this product. Ive used it on both the streets and highway with not to much movement on the boards i would definetly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: teddy

customer_reviews.title: Why Pay More?
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why someone would pay for an expensive roof rack for their surfboard when this thing does the trick. It's easy to install and holds the boards just fine. I drive a honda accord and have an 8 ft board, the board hangs off the roof and catches a little wind while I drive, but the rack keeps the board steady. Even if the board wiggles a bit while I am driving, I am confident the rack will hold tight.
customer_reviews.author: CocoThe Slug

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Held the surfboard onto the rack like the reviews Easy to assemble, came with instructions on the bag of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: causes car damage. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is really not worth the cheap purchase. Not only is it incredibly noisy it caused an incredible amount of damage on my car. After using it for a few months on and off I started to notice that water was leaking into my car when it rained. The body shop told me that the racks ABSOLUTELY caused the rubber on the edge of my door to change shape. This cost me an incredible amount of money to repair. Truly not worth it, just get a normal rack installed by professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wilner

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure how to position them on the car to reduce noise, they work great! Easy to install. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Great product...Prime failed
customer_reviews.text: The rack works fine, I tried Prime for the first time, it came on day 3, day 2...so we'll see if Prime is worth it I am continuing to type, so that I have the minimum words in my review, for it to be posted UNCLE!
customer_reviews.author: Book Mommy

customer_reviews.title: It would probably work great for surf boards
customer_reviews.text: It would probably work great for surf boards, but was to narrow for my SUP boards. I don't think the description specified the width of board it would accommodate. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Polly McKissick

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I was able to secure two kayaks to my roof. Needed extra straps because the ones on here weren't long enough. Much more economical than buying a roof rack system.
customer_reviews.author: miggy500

customer_reviews.title: great product. inside strap fits threw car (instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. inside strap fits threw car (instead of clips that i cant trust) to fit all vehicles. now i can go surfing w/ friends in same car.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy, great for my Corolla
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2010 Corolla Sport very well. First I was a bit afraid driving on the freeways, but it holds up great, very little movement if you do it right! Now I can take my friends surfing too!
customer_reviews.author: brady

customer_reviews.title: simple, elegant, does the job
customer_reviews.text: love this rack. it's minimalistic, but has everything a rack should have. it protects your car, keeps your boards on tight (4 longboards, ~80mph for several hours on a toyota camry), and is easy to set up/take down. just be smart in how you wrap up your excess straps and you'll be zooming off to the coast w/ zero noise.
customer_reviews.author: scillakat

product_meta.title: Block Surf Wrap-Rax Soft Rack Double
product_meta.description: Block Surf racks are the industry standard. No rain gutters needed. Racks wrap through vehicle, greatly increasing the security of your boards! Securely carries up to six boards. Comes with convenient carry bag.
feature_bullets: The double rack will carry up to four surfboards securely
Includes carrying case with draw string
Designed with heavy aircraft buckles for safety and strength
